title: Which causes movement along demand curve

content.question: A change in which of the following will cause a movement along the demand curve for a product?

choices.label: The prices of the product’s substitutes
The prices of the product’s complements

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
